```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import modstruve
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> modstruve(1, 2.)
1.102759787367716 
```

```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(-5., 5., 1000)
>>> for i in range(4):
...     ax.plot(x, modstruve(i, x), label=f'$L_{i!r}$')
>>> ax.legend(ncol=2)
>>> ax.set_xlim(-5, 5)
>>> ax.set_title(r"Modified Struve functions $L_{\nu}$")
>>> plt.show() 
```
